drug.name: Endostar
drug.description: Endostar is under investigation for the treatment of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma. Endostar has been investigated for the treatment of Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.

category.category: Compounds used in a research, industrial, or household setting

drug-interaction.name: Darbepoetin alfa
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Endostar.

drug-interaction.name: Erythropoietin
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Endostar.

drug-interaction.name: Peginesatide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Endostar.

drug-interaction.name: Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta is combined with Endostar.

drug-interaction.name: Pamidronic acid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Endostar is combined with Pamidronic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Zoledronic acid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Endostar is combined with Zoledronic acid.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Endostar is combined with Clodronic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Risedronic acid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Endostar is combined with Risedronic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Etidronic acid

drug-interaction.name: Incadronic acid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Endostar is combined with Incadronic acid.
